column1: Art Institute of Chicago////They had sections of Contemporary Art
column4: etc. We really enjoyed the miniature rooms collection. So much to do
column6: to get the best for your money you really should wipe your schedule clean and spend atleast half a day here. Bring comfy shoes - my feet ached so bad by the time I was there a few hours
column7: I had to go. This place is absolutely amazing. Your trip will not be complete without a stop here.
